name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: It's a great day for Kim and Kanye. To them I'd like to say, "Congratulations on your wedding unless this is a rerun, in which case my condolences on your divorce."

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: They got married in Florence. The name Florence holds special meaning for Kim because it's the name that Bruce Jenner goes by.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Congratulations to the remarkable Jessie White. She's a woman from Maine who just graduated college, and she's 99 years old. I said she's 99, so cheer a little bit louder, everybody.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Jessie White was asked what she was going to wear to her first job interview. She said "Depends."
